\begin{eqnarray} A_s^{{\rm
bosonic\,string}}&=&\frac{-1}{1+2s}A_s^{{\rm supestring}}\,\,,\nonumber\\

bosonic\,string}}&=&\frac{-1}{1+2u}A_u^{{\rm supestring}}\,\,,\nonumber\\

supestring}}\,\,.\nonumber\

\begin{eqnarray} A_t&\!\!\!=\!\!\!&

k_4)-\frac{\pi^2\alpha'^2}{3}(k_1\!\cdot\! k_3)(k_2\!\cdot\! k_4)-F_t^{{\rm
on}}\frac{}{}\right),\nonumber\

\begin{eqnarray} F_t^{{\rm on}}=0\quad; &{\rm
for}&\Phi_1\Phi_2\Phi_3\Phi_4\,\,,\nonumber\\
F_t^{{\rm on}}=-\frac{\pi^2}{3}\alpha'k_2\!\cdot\! k_3\quad;&{\rm
for}&T_1\Phi_2\Phi_3T_4\,\,,\nonumber\\
F_t^{{\rm on}}=-\frac{\pi^2}{3}(\alpha'k_2\!\cdot\! k_3+\alpha' k_1\!\cdot\!
k_4+1)\quad;&{\rm for }&T_1T_2T_3T_4\,\,.\label{ft}\

d^{p+1}x
\left(1-\pi T^2 +\gamma T^3+\beta T^4\right.\nonumber\\

-\pi^2\alpha'T^2(\prt_aT\prt^aT)-
\frac{\pi^2\alpha'^2}{2}(\prt_aT\prt^aT)^2+\cdots\right)\nonumber\,\,,
